mapper.insert: insert into hangzhou (M_ID, M_NAME, M_ADDRESS, M_MDATE, M_TYPE, M_EDUCATION, M_DISTANCE, M_PHONE, M_RESULT, M_FEEL) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mMdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mDistance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mFeel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
